person.persName: Robert Boyd (Whitley Circuit Court clerk and Laurel County attorney)

body.p: Residence: London, Laurel County, Kentucky. Born in Boyds Bend, Whitley County, Kentucky, son of Samuel Boyd and Mary A. Sears. Raised and attended common school in Whitley County. Attended Centre College, Danville, Kentucky. Began reading law with Judge Green Adams, of Barboursville, Kentucky, in 1855. Elected Whitley Circuit Court clerk in 1856. Admitted to the bar in 1858, during his term as circuit court clerk. His term of office expired in 1862. He moved to London, Laurel County, Kentucky, the next year, where he continued to practice law.
